About BSB Building Better Websites Together

We believe that creating beautiful, accessible websites should be simple and educational. That's why we built BSB.

Our Mission

To democratize web development by providing a self-documenting boilerplate that teaches best practices while building.

ðŸŽ¯

Purposeful

Every line of code has a purpose and is documented to explain not just what it does, but why it exists.

ðŸ“š

Educational

Learn modern web development practices through comprehensive inline documentation and examples.

ðŸš€

Production-Ready

Start with a solid foundation that includes optimization, accessibility, and deployment automation.

Our Story

Branded Static Boilerplate was born from a simple observation: too many developers struggle with the gap between tutorials and real-world implementation.

We noticed that while there are countless tutorials teaching individual concepts, there's a lack of comprehensive examples showing how everything fits together in a production environment.

BSB bridges this gap by providing a complete, production-ready static site boilerplate where every decision is documented and every pattern is explained. It's not just a starting pointâ€”it's a learning platform.

Our Values

These principles guide every decision we make

Accessibility First

The web should be accessible to everyone. BSB includes accessibility best practices by default, not as an afterthought.

Performance Matters

Fast websites create better experiences. We optimize for performance at every level, from code structure to build process.

Learning by Doing

The best way to learn is through practical examples. Every component is a lesson in modern web development.

Community Driven

BSB grows through community contributions. We welcome developers of all skill levels to help improve the project.

Ready to Build Something Amazing?

Join thousands of developers who are building better websites with BSB.
